detaileddescription.para: Description: initialises the menu system so that it is fully operational

briefdescription.para: services any user interface with the menu

detaileddescription.para: Description: Checks the serial/local buffers for inputs
Returns: 1 if input has been received, 0 otherwise

inbodydescription.para: Wait until the receive buffer is no longer empty Indicating that a command has been passed

briefdescription.para: ISR function for the menu subsystem.

detaileddescription.para: Description: services any interrupts associated with the menu system

briefdescription.para: services any user interface with the menu

detaileddescription.para: Description: Checks if the user has made any inputs to the system. If not the function simply returns. If they have then it services the inputs, displays the correct outputs and performs the specified actions

inbodydescription.para: If Esc or Back button pressed, return
